alert.note: Alert for Gunnison; Pitkin (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued July 30 at 5:19PM MDT until July 30 at 8:30PM MDT by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: The National Weather Service in Grand Junction has issued a * Flash Flood Warning for... Northern Gunnison County in west central Colorado... Northwestern Pitkin County in west central Colorado... * Until 830 PM MDT. * At 519 PM MDT, local law enforcement reported thunderstorms producing heavy rain in Highway 133 north of Redstone, which caused a mudslide near mile marker 57. Flash flooding is already occurring. HAZARD...Flash flooding caused by thunderstorms. SOURCE...Law enforcement reported. IMPACT...Flash flooding of small creeks and streams, urban areas, highways, streets and underpasses as well as other poor drainage and low-lying areas. * Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Redstone. This includes the following highways... Colorado 133 between mile markers 42 and 63. FLASH FLOOD...OBSERVED
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
